Literature.Title: The antimicrobial peptide SAAP-148 combats drug-resistant bacteria and biofilms.
Literature.Author: de Breij A, Riool M, Cordfunke RA, Malanovic N, de Boer L, Koning RI, Ravensbergen E, Franken M, van der Heijde T, Boekema BK, Kwakman PHS, Kamp N, El Ghalbzouri A, Lohner K, Zaat SA, Drijfhout JW, Nibbering PH

Literature.Title: Controlled Release of LL-37-Derived Synthetic Antimicrobial and Anti-Biofilm Peptides SAAP-145 and SAAP-276 Prevents Experimental Biomaterial-Associated Staphylococcus aureus Infection
Literature.Author: Riool M, de Breij A, de Boer L, Kwakman PHS, Cordfunke RA, Cohen O, Malanovic N, Emanuel N, Lohner K, Drijfhout JW, Nibbering PH, Zaat SA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus JAR060131(LC=1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus JAR060131(LC=12.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(LC=1.6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(LC=25.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus LUH14616(LC=1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus LUH14616(LC=6.4-25.6µM)
